ValidationRule.description: This ensures that a user cannot 'close lost' a 'business plan' opportunity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Product_Sales_Summary__c != null, At_Risk__c = true, BP_Target__c = true, ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Lost'), OR( RecordType.Id == '012C0000000GaIO', RecordType.Id == '012800000002ReS', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000Ga1g', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000Ga2F', RecordType.Id == '0123b000000Qfs9', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000GZza', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000QEmM', RecordType.Id == '012C0000000YQrE', RecordType.Id == '0123b000000Qfrz' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An Opportunity that is 'At Risk' and a 'BP Target' cannot be 'Closed Lost'
